body:
Comment 2 by **pwil3058**: 
I've been thinking about it since and have come to the conclusion that splitting
pkg1.go into two files (identical except for struct field tags) and importing them
both into pkg3.go would have been a better test.  Right now the fact that the
untagged field doesn't cause a problem is hidden by the fact that its declaration is
in the same file as the one that fails.

I can see two alternative fixes for this problem.  I look forward to seeing if either
of them is chosen.
